title: Haier 258 L Frost Free Double Door 2 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Grey Steel, HEF-25TGS)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator, User Manual, Ice Tray, Key, Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase||Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty is not valid in case of the following events:||If the product has been installed/serviced/repaired/opened or tampered by any unauthorized personnel/technician||If defects arise/caused by accidents, alteration, misuse, neglect, substitution of original components with spurious/non-genuine components, attacked by household pest/ rodents, flood, earthquake, lightning and /or any other act of God/natural calamities||The product is shifted outside India||Warranty does not cover Plastic, Glassware and Bulb

product_description.Design: This top mount double door refrigerator from Haier has been designed to give a sleek, premium, and lavish look to your kitchen.
product_description.5-in-1 Convertible: The 5 modes of this refrigerator customize its operation to suit your cooling needs, so you can use it optimally and conveniently.

review: Best performing latest model advanced feature good work overall best

Delivery was fast & installation was done after 2 days. The fridge was really a good value for money deal. Its design is elegant & colour is really pleasing for the eye. The cooling is ok & also its function is great for the price. We can turn it to power save mode if v dont need it or v can turbo cool if v need urgent ice. Its convertable feature is useful. I will surely recomed this product for my frnds & family
Writing this review after 4 months of usage..it works perfectly fine! Worth the buy! Just love it
I really very happy to buy this i suprise to my mom to buy this one my mom was very happy deffinetly go for it i like very much tq flipkart 🙏

Super condition and large space good condition my rating is 4.9/5.
Mainly small disappointed is colour same is not in image .cement colour undhi but super condition and good product low budget high performance

Running good so far. Can't say much because it's just 10 days since I bought it. But I am happy with the cooling. Delivery was quick and the installation session was also good. Hoping to have amazing experience in the future. Thanks, Flipkart and Haier.

The product is dam cool because it is fridge😂joke apart but whoever the product is Dam good for day to day life and valuable for money if u expect more from this then u r not perfect to put your money in this

Best. Value for money. l used this product for last few days, so l can't explain much. Overall performance is very good . Quality is best as compare to other Refrigerator. Noise sound is less, cooling is good. I suggest to other customers. Who are looking for best refrigerator can go for this without hesitation.

I am using this from 2 months didn't found any issue. It's frost free but some time the waste get deposited this happen 3times whenever their is long time power cut in my locality. Very much spacious all required items fits well inside. One thing is not good that is freezer chamber doesn't have light. It's convertible feature is of great use as in my house, we don't need freezer most of the time. Overall a great purchase from Flipkart.

Value for money object. Really like it. Just short of little bit of space as it can be more spacious. Gave 4 stars cz of poor installation guy. Overall happy and satisfied with the super fast cooling. Go for it without thinking if you have a small family of 4 members.

The refrigerator is an amazing choice with superb space in freezer and fridge. It has been performing really well. The only concern I have is with the delivery of the product. It was delivered by two delivery person in a tempo. Since I live in a flat at 1st floor, I had to help the two delivery person for carrying the refrigerator to my house. I have no problem in providing a helping hand but there is a major chance that such electronic appliance may suffer a permanent damage while carrying if there are insufficient people to carry it. So I would request flipkart to allot more people for carrying such heavy appliances.

It looks aesthetic! Even though capacity is 258L, due to its tall design it looks quite big in size. Storage space is great and chilling level is high and quick. Above all, it's very energy efficient, consuming only 182 units per year which is more efficient than many single door refrigerators. Afterall, its World's No1 Refrigerator brand.

I have purchased this at 21st jan under exchange of old refrigerator and delivered next day..

I have divided mine experience or review in 2 parts.

1st Product and 2nd Delivery/Exchange

Now talk about 1st part which is really good. Refrigerator is good at cost,good cooling but space is less as it is 258 ltr, usable space is only 235 ltr.
Demo and installation was done on time just next day.

Convertible feature is working very good.

Now talk about 2nd part which is Delivery/Exchange.
And this is horrible.

I will suggest you that, If you're going to do exchange any old item so DON'T DO.

Exchange executive shows low amount of old refrigerator and when I got revised invoice there are higher value of old item that mean I paid extra amount.

After many talks, communications flipkart team refunded me extra amount which I paid.

Flipkart team done good job but delivery person are dishonest.

I had some apprehensions when I was about to buy his refrigerator however I've had a great experience with a Haier microwave I had bought in 2013 and it still works great years ago. I was also getting a good exchange price for my old refrigerator so I pulled the trigger on this purchase.

This is an excellent piece of equipment that works just as advertised. I'm extremely happy how quickly it creates ice cubes.

The only negative I found is that the fridge light is located at the top in the front, when you fill up the fridge not much light reaches the back making it a bit difficult to see whats stored.

There are absolutely no issues performance wise. I recommend buying this fridge.
